name: Trekke
description:
PLAYING IN FULLSCREEN IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Trekke is a robot whose sole purpose is to collect ice cream from the factory and bring it to all the people enjoying the beach and the hot weather. However, he can't do it without your help! You must tell him exactly how to do it by programming his every move!

HOW TO PLAY: 

Drag and drop the appropriate move tile to an empty slot. 

Set the move tile's distance by adjusting the slider.

After each adjustment, a ghost will appear to help you measure the needed distance.

Collect ALL the ice cream!

Try to be as efficient as possible!

Have fun!

MOVE TILE LEGEND

=> - Move left

<= - Move right

/\ V - Jump left

V /\ - Jump right

! - Pull the Lever

This game was made as a submission for Minijam 93: Vacation.
